org.eclipse.golo.compiler

Class GoloCompilationException.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.golo.compiler.GoloCompilationException.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    GoloCompilationException

    public static class GoloCompilationException.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    An exception builder object allows preparing an exception by progressively adding problems.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(java.lang.String goloSourceFilename)
      Makes a builder to report problems in a source file.
